snippet: British foreign minister Boris Johnson condemned North Korea's firing of four ballistic missiles into the sea off northwest Japan, saying such "provocative actions" were a threat to international peace and security....

headline.main: French President Calls for a Multi-Speed Europe
headline.print_headline: French President Calls for a Multi-Speed Europe

lead_paragraph: British foreign minister Boris Johnson condemned North Korea's firing of four ballistic missiles into the sea off northwest Japan, saying such "provocative actions" were a threat to international peace and security.
